SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.mapper

Interface MessageMapper

public interface MessageMapper
MapStruct mapper interface for converting between MessageEntity and MessageDTO.

Features:

  • Automatic mapping between entity and DTO, including sender and receiver IDs
  • Custom mapping for user ID to UserEntity for sender and receiver fields

Usage: This interface is implemented automatically by MapStruct at build time. Inject or obtain an instance via CDI or the generated implementation for use in your service layer.

  • Method Details

    • toEntity

      MessageEntity toEntity(MessageDTO dto)
      Maps a MessageDTO to a MessageEntity.

      Maps senderId and receiverId to UserEntity references.

      Parameters:
      dto - the DTO to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped entity, or null if input is null

    • toDto

      MessageDTO toDto(MessageEntity entity)
      Maps a MessageEntity to a MessageDTO.

      Maps sender and receiver UserEntity references to their IDs.

      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped DTO, or null if input is null

    • mapUserIdToUserEntity

      default UserEntity mapUserIdToUserEntity(Long userId)
      Helper method to map a user ID to a UserEntity reference for mapping sender/receiver.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      a UserEntity with the given ID, or null if userId is null
